title: Finding Promise
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B008N25Y80A woman striving for independence.A man with a charmed upbringing.A small town filled with welcoming and quirky characters.Caroline had led the life of a high society daughter and wife, one that was filled with soul-destroying emotional abuse. When her husband unexpectedly dies, she finds herself broke and flees New York without a plan or destination in mind. Her travels lead her to Promise, a small town on the New England coast.Following instinct, she settles in Promise and begins to explore her new found independence and the pleasurable side of love with ruggedly handsome local, Luke Edwards. Her contentment is shattered as past resurrects itself and she needs to find the courage to face it before she can truly re-build her life.
author: Aneesa Price
